=== About Me ===
  Name: Fábio Augusto De Muzio Tobich <<BR>>

  Born in 1977 and introduced in virtual world in 1985, when my father brought home an Apple TK-85 (thousands of hours typing program codes in BASIC...). <<BR>>

  Linux user since 1998, I now work in <nowiki>[[http://www.celepar.pr.gov.br|CELEPAR]]</nowiki> maintaining a customized a version of <nowiki>[[http://www.debian.org|Debian GNU/Linux]]</nowiki>, maintaining several packages and repository for utilization by the company and customers. Working in a parallel project to migrate the base system of the customized distro to Ubuntu 10.04. <<BR>>

  I had recently joined the Ubuntu Brazilian Comunity and I planning to get involved helping with support in mailing lists and IRC, and work in package translation. <<BR>>

  My hometown is '''Telêmaco Borba''', PR, but actually I live in '''Curitiba''', PR, Brazil.
